entry.title: Converting hexadecimal ip addresses to dotted quads with Bash
entry.summary: This is another post that is primarily for my own benefit for the next time I forget how to do this. I wanted to read routing information directly from /proc/net/route using bash, because you never know what may or may not be available in the minimal environment of a Docker container (for example, the iproute package is not installed by default in the Fedora Docker images).
